## underscoreCaseToCamelCase variable

Given an underscore-cased string, returns a camel-cased string.

e.g.:

- foo\_bar → fooBar - foo → foo

**Signature:**

```typescript
underscoreCaseToCamelCase: (underscoreCasedString: string) => string
```
